title: Ninja Crispi 4-in-1 Portable Glass Air Fryer Cooking System, 4QT & 6 Cup Glass Containers with Storage Lids, Easy Meals, Microwave, Freezer & Dishwasher Safe, Air Fry, Bake & More, Cyberspace, FN101GY
description: The Ninja Crispi Portable Cooking System packs the 1500W power of a full-sized air fryer into a portable design. It includes a 6-cup and a 4-QT TempWare container. Whether you’re whipping up quick single-serve meals in 7 minutes, sharing crispy snacks on the go, or serving a crowd, the Ninja Crispi makes it easy. With TempWare glassware, you can go right from frozen to crispy in minutes.
